name: Crypt (Cole_Knapp)
description:
Crypt is best played with a gamepad 

You play as a skeleton that needs to escape the crypt so he can find his way back home.

Crypt is not finished but I wanted to release a demo so everyone could play the game and provide feedback as I work on it. If there is any interest in completing the game I will continue to work on it, otherwise I will move onto new exciting projects! 

All of the levels are avaiable from the beginning of the game and your game is saved to the furthest level you reach

  • 1 : Enable/Disable music
  • M or Select : Main Menu
  • Left/Right Arrow Key : move Forward or Backward a level

If you encounter any game breaking bugs please let me know and I will try to fix them as soon as possible.

Game made by Cole Knapp - twitter/Cole_Knapp

Music: Eric Skiff - Ascending - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
